covid_dashboard_displayer module

This module will open the covid dashboard and deal with the user

covid_dashboard_displayer.caluclate_time_for_update(update_time: str) → int

Takes the time at which the update should be executed and finds the number of seconds until the update should happen.

update_timestr

The value inputed by the user for which the update should happen

time_till_update: int

The number of seconds until the update should be executed

covid_dashboard_displayer.covid_dashboard()

Deals with data inputs from the website and displays the html with relevan data

None

render_templatefunction

html file with relevant data

covid_dashboard_displayer.create_new_update(update_to_create: dict) → None

Creates a new update when called

update_to_createdict

A dictionary containing the data to create an update

None

covid_dashboard_displayer.remove_updates(update: dict) → None

Used to remove and cancel updates from the covid and news update lists and schedulers

updatedict

A dictionary containg the update to remove

None

covid_dashboard_displayer.restore_state() → None

Used to read the log file and reload the previous state accordingly

None

None

covid_dashboard_displayer.return_to_dashboard()

Redirects to /index

None

redirect : function Redirects to /index
